text: What is the formula for the gravitational force between two masses m1 and m2 separated by a distance r?
If a body is moving with constant velocity, what is the net force acting on it?
What is the work done on an object if it is displaced by a distance d in the direction of a force F?
What is the SI unit of electric charge?
If a wave has a frequency f and wavelength λ, what is its speed v?
